issue.title: [CI] Set docker-compose to use docker-cli instead of docker-py for building images
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8316](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8316). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The images pushed from the master branch were sometimes producing reusable layers, sometimes not. So the caching was working non-deterministically. 
The underlying issue is https://github.com/docker/compose/issues/883
